Class MiniMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.m2107.p24.MiniMap

    MiniMapDisplay

    public class MiniMap
extends java.lang.Object
    Represent the operation of the minimap.

      • checkNeighbors

        public Room checkNeighbors(Position p)
        Checks if a room at the given position has a neighbor, and choose one of them randomly to be the next.
        Parameters:
        p - The position of the room.
        Returns:
        The next room.

      • tick

                    Player p)

        Parameters:
        room - the current room.
        p - the player wanted.
        Returns:
        if the boss is dead or not.
